description: CSS file for theming and styling components in a Twitter-like frontend application.

classes.name: .App
classes.description: Main application container with center-aligned text and background color based on theme.

classes.name: .App-header
classes.description: Header section of the application with background color and layout for centering elements.

classes.name: .App-link
classes.description: Styles for links in the application, designed to change color on hover.

classes.name: .theme-toggle
classes.description: Button for toggling themes with distinct styles and animations.
